## BlockSvg.getSvgRoot() method

Return the root node of the SVG or null if none exists.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSvgRoot(): SVGGElement;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

SVGGElement

The root SVG node (probably a group).
